Verses: 1 avargal Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Irandaam Varusham Mudhalaam Maadhaththil Karththar Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Moseyai Nokki:
2 kuriththa Kaalaththil Isravel Puththirar Paskaavai Aasarikkakkadavargal.

3 indha Maadham Padhinaalaanthedhi Andhineramaana Velaiyaagiya Kuriththa Kaalaththil Adhai Aasarikkakkadaveergal; Adharkuriya Ellaak Kattalaiyinpadiyeyum Muraimaigalinpadiyeyum Adhai Aasarikkakkadaveergal Endraar.
4 appadiye Paskaavai Aasarikkumpadi Mose Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kattalaiyittaan.

5 adhinaal Mudhalaam Maadham Padhinaangaam Thedhi Andhineramaana Velaiyil, Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Paskaavai Aasariththaargal; Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Isravel Puththirar Seydhaargal.
6 annaalil Silar Manidha Predhaththinaal Theettuppattapadiyinaal Paskaavai Aasarikkaththagaadhavargalaayirundhaargal; Avargal Annaalile Mosekkum Aaronukkum Munbaaga Vandhu:

7 naangal Manidha Predhaththinaal Theettuppattavargal; Kuriththa Kaalaththil Isravel Puththirarodekoodak Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyai Seluththaadhapadikku, Naangal Vilakkappattirukkavendiyadhu Enna Endraargal.
8 mose Avargalai Nokki: Porungal; Karththar Ungalaikkuriththuk Kattalaiyiduvadhu Enna Endru Ketpen Endraan.
9 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

10 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Ungalilaagilum Ungal Sandhadhiyaarilaagilum Oruvan Predhaththinaal Theettuppattaalum, Prayaanamaaith Thoorampoyirundhaalum, Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasarikkavendum.
11 avargal Adhai Irandaam Maadham Padhinaalaandhedhi Andhineramaana Velaiyil Aasariththu, Adhaip Pulippillaadha Appangalodum Kasappaana Keeraigalodum Pusiththu,
12 vidiyarkaalammattum Adhil Ondrum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamalum, Adhil Oru Elumbaiyum Murikkaamalum, Paskaavinudaiya Sagala Muraimaigalinpadiyum Adhai Aasarikkakkadavargal.

13 oruvan Suththamullavanumaaip Prayaanam Pogaadhavanumaayirundhum, Paskaavai Aasarikkaadheponaal, Andha Aaththumaa Kuriththa Kaalaththil Karththarin Paliyai Seluththaadhapadiyinaal Than Janaththaaril Iraamal Aruppundupovaan; Andha Manidhan Than Paavaththai Sumappaan.

14 oru Paradhesi Ungalidaththile Thangi, Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasarikkavendumaanaal, Avan Adhaip Paskaavin Kattalaippadiyum Adhin Muraimaiyinpadiyum Aasarikkakkadavan; Paradhesikkum Sudhesikkum Ore Kattalai Irukkavendum Endru Sol Endraar.

15 vaasasthalam Sthaabanancheyyappatta Naalile, Megamaanadhu Saatchiyin Koodaaramaagiya Vaasasthalaththai Mooditru; Saayangaalamaanapodhu, Vaasasthalaththinmel Akkinimayamaana Oru Thotramundaayitru; Adhu Vidiyarkaalamattum Irundhadhu.
16 ippadi Niththamum Irundhadhu; Pagalil Megamum, Iravil Akkiniththotramum Adhai Moodikkondirundhadhu.
17 megam Koodaaraththilirundhu Mele Ezhumbumpodhu Isravel Puththirar Prayaanampannuvaargal; Megam Thangumidaththil Isravel Puththirar Paalayamiranguvaargal.

18 karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Isravel Puththirar Prayaanappaduvaargal;karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Paalayamiranguvaargal; Megam Vaasasthalaththinmel Thangiyirukkum Naalellaam Avargal Paalayaththil Thangiyiruppaargal.
19 megam Nedunaal Vaasasthalaththinmel Thangiyirukkumpodhu, Isravel Puththirar Prayaanappadaamal Karththarin Kaavalaik Kaaththukkondiruppaargal.
20 megam Silanaal Maaththiram Vaasasthalaththinmel Thangiyirukkumpodhu, Karththarudaiyakattalaiyinpadiye Paalayamirangiyirundhu, Karththarudaiyakattalaiyinpadiye Prayaanappaduvaargal.
21 megam Saayangaalanthodangi Vidiyarkaalamattum Irundhu, Vidiyarkaalaththil Uyara Ezhumbumpodhu, Udane Prayaanappaduvaargal; Pagalilaagilum Iravilaagilum Megam Ezhumbumpodhu Prayaanappaduvaargal.

22 megamaanadhu Irandunaalaavadhu Oru Maadhamaavadhu Oru Varushamaavadhu Vaasasthalaththinmel Thangiyirukkumpodhu, Isravel Puththirar Prayaanampannaamal Paalayamirangiyiruppaargal; Adhu Uyara Ezhumbumpodho Prayaanappaduvaargal.

23 karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Paalayamiranguvaargal; Karththarudaiyakattalaiyinpadiye Prayaanampannuvaargal; Karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyidugirapadiye Karththarudaiya Kaavalaik Kaaththukkolvaargal.
